languages.text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}Finish the Job{/g} ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}完成任务{/g}这个能力杀死敌人时，装备者都会获得20%{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，立刻消除{g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}枪炮奏鸣{/g}与{g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}最终齐射{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}Finish the Job{/g} ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用完成任务这个能力杀死敌人时，装备者都会获得20%{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，立刻消除枪炮奏鸣与最终齐射{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。

languages.text: 使用者がとどめのアビリティで敵をキルすると、使用者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得し、自身のうねるファイアストームと最後の斉射の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}を取り除く
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: 着用者が仕事の完了アビリティで敵を殺すと、着用者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間ダメージに20％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}獲得し、自身の炎嵐の指揮と最後の斉射の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}を取り除く。

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo con la capacidad {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}Terminar el trabajo{/g}, el portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y elimina el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Tormenta de fuego coordinada{/g} y {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Salva final{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind mit der Fähigkeit {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}Die Aufgabe erledigen{/g} tötet, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und entfernt die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Geplanter Feuersturm{/g} und {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Letzte Salve{/g}.

languages.text: Убивая противника способностью {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}Завершить начатое{/g}, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} и мгновенно завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановление{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Направленный шквал{/g} и {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Последний рывок{/g}.

Убивая противника способностью Завершить начатое, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20% к наносимому урону на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} и мгновенно завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановление{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} Направленный шквал и Последний рывок.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi à l'aide de la capacité {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}Finir le travail{/g} , il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +20 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Tempête de feu dirigée{/g} et {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Dernière salve{/g} est annulé.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir düşmanı {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}İşi Bitir{/g} kabiliyeti ile öldürdüğünde 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır.
